title: Generator
description: A clay generator definition. Describes the steps taken to generate files based on the json model. Selection is done using JSONPath. Touch means it wont overwrite the file if it exists.

items.description: The partial to use. A partial adds functionality to the mustache templates as they are generating.
The formatter to use. For example if this generator uses the prettifier formatter, the value would be 'clay-generator-formatter-prettier'.

runCommand.description: The command-line to execute. Mustache templating accessible with selected data based on the select property.

select.description: JSONPath to select the data to be used in the template.
JSONPath to select the data to be used in the template.

target.description: The ouput file to copy to. Mustache template accessible with selectd data based on the select property

generate.description: The mustache template or directory of templates to generate the output.
